stageList.title: Quote Received
stageList.desc: A new order has been placed by a buyer. The details are available for your review.

stageList.title: Quote Sent
stageList.desc: Your quote has been sent to the buyer and is currently under review.

stageList.title: Quote Accepted
stageList.desc: The buyer has accepted the quote you had sent.

stageList.title: Advance Payment Received
stageList.desc: he buyer has made an advance payment of 30% as per the agreed quote. You can now begin the service.

stageList.title: Service In Progress
stageList.desc: You are currently working on the service.

stageList.title: Service Delivered
stageList.desc: You have successfully delivered the service. The buyer will review and confirm.

stageList.title: Awaiting Buyer Review
stageList.desc: The buyer is reviewing the delivered service. You will be notified once they confirm completion.

stageList.title: Delivery Accepted
stageList.desc: The buyer has accepted the service. You will receive the remaining payment.

stageList.title: Final Payment Received
stageList.desc: The buyer has confirmed the completion of the service and released the remaining payment

stageList.title: Order Completed
stageList.desc: The service has been marked as completed. Thank you for your work!

stageList.title: Order rejected By You
stageList.desc: The order was cancelled by you.
